name: Tesla Wars
description:
Tesla Wars - hours of zapping fun on your fingertips!

Gather up all the strategic thinking and all the reaction speed you have to beat off the endless attacks of merciless enemies armed with chainsaws, fuel tanks and missiles. Shoot the sole Tesla Tower charges to crush the land, air and even underground strikes. Bash the black swarm with mines, toxic bombs, freezes, electromagnetic storms and other Special Weapons! Find out the perfect tactics to collect all the achievements and reward money. Challenge your friends to prove that you’re the Number One!

Anytime, anywhere Tesla Wars will keep you addicted

THE GAMEPLAY HIGHLIGHTS

- Unique world and the amazing game atmosphere. Hilarious sound effects and flashy graphics are here to hypnotize you

- Breathtaking gameplay with an unbelievable number of levels. New challenges will keep you excited with the Tesla Wars

- Spice up the action with new flavors. Each level you meet new enemies, new weapons and new tactics

- Reverse the fight with the aces up your sleeve. Use the Special Weapons if zapping is just not enough

- Boost your progress if you’re stuck. Use extra resources for energy refill, perimeter repairing and weapons upgrading

- Challenge your friends. Get all the achievements and climb up to the top of OpenFeint and Game Center Leaderboards

- Feel free to choose your way. Use different game profiles to try out various strategies

REVIEWS

- Well worth picking up for any castle-defense fan that's after a new challenge - App Spy
- I had a hard time putting the game down long enough to write this, and I plan to go back and blast more stick people to bits - 148apps.com
- It’s definitely worth taking the time to download and play - PadGadget
- Tesla Wars is a great game that mixes real time action, hilarious concept, and explosive fun - Tom’s Guide
